title: Bum Bum
lyrics: tone vòng hợp âm  Bang Bang Ba Lang, Bang Bang Ba Lang Bang Bang Ba Lang, Bang Bang Bang Bang I see you to night. You bring me to life And groove let the music's gonna in me Hi baby let's me free I feelin' to night. I'm better than life Romantic, crazy, beautiful and true So only I need you... Bang Bang Ba Lang, Bang Bang Ba Lang Bang Bang Ba Lang, Bang Bang Bang Bang So give me some times. I'm loosin' my mind And groove let the music's gonna in me Hi baby let's me free I dreamin' to find. This love of mind Romantic, crazy, beautiful and true So only I need you... Bang Bang Ba Lang, Bang Bang Ba Lang Bang Bang Ba Lang, Bang Bang Bang Bang
